${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:AbsentMinded.NAME: Absent-Minded
${modID}:AbsentMinded.DESCRIPTION: Play and Forget the top card in your draw pile.

${modID}:AllNighter.NAME: All-Nighter
${modID}:AllNighter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Insomnia. At the start of your turn, gain [E].

${modID}:AllADream.NAME: All a Dream
${modID}:AllADream.DESCRIPTION: Heal 20HP. NL At the end of combat, lose 15HP.

${modID}:AlterEgo.NAME: Alter Ego
${modID}:AlterEgo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Forget all other attack cards in your hand.

${modID}:BackAndForth.NAME: Back And Forth
${modID}:BackAndForth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. NL Forget.

${modID}:BlankSlate.NAME: Blank Slate
${modID}:BlankSlate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle every Forgotten card in play into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BlankSlate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle every Forgotten card in play into your draw pile.

${modID}:BreakTheCycle.NAME: Break The Cycle
${modID}:BreakTheCycle.DESCRIPTION: Forget 1 Attack in your hand and gain its base damage as Block.
${modID}:BreakTheCycle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Forget 1 or more Attacks in your hand. NL Gain their combined base damage as Block.

${modID}:CircadianRhythm.NAME: Circadian Rhythm
${modID}:CircadianRhythm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! card. NL At the end of your turn, Forget !M! card.
${modID}:CircadianRhythm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! card. NL At the end of your turn, Forget !M! card.

${modID}:ChosenOne.NAME: Chosen One
${modID}:ChosenOne.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever this enemy deals unblocked attack damage, enter Trance. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Closure.NAME: Closure
${modID}:Closure.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Remembered, Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Coma.NAME: Coma
${modID}:Coma.DESCRIPTION: Gain 99 Vision. NL This turn, when you draw a card that is not Forgotten, discard it. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Commune.NAME: Commune
${modID}:Commune.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and draw 1 card. NL If it is a Forgotten card, play this card again.

${modID}:Compulsion.NAME: Compulsion
${modID}:Compulsion.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block. NL Add a copy of this card to your discard. NL Forget.

${modID}:Daydream.NAME: Daydream
${modID}:Daydream.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, retain !M! random forgotten cards.

${modID}:DeepMemory.NAME: Deep Memory
${modID}:DeepMemory.DESCRIPTION: If you are in Trance, draw cards until you draw a Forgotten card. NL Otherwise, enter Trance.

${modID}:Dizzy.NAME: Dizzy
${modID}:Dizzy.DESCRIPTION: Starts Forgotten. NL Urgent. NL Forget a random card in your hand. NL Forget.

${modID}:DreamSequence.NAME: Dream Sequence
${modID}:DreamSequence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Forget 1 or more cards. NL Draw that many cards.

${modID}:Dredge.NAME: Dredge
${modID}:Dredge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put the next non-Forgotten card in your draw pile into your hand.

${modID}:Envelop.NAME: Envelop
${modID}:Envelop.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Block for each Forgotten card in your deck.
${modID}:Envelop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Block for each Forgotten card in your deck.

${modID}:EnterDreams.NAME: Enter Dreams
${modID}:EnterDreams.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable for each Insomnia on the target. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ExposureTherapy.NAME: Exposure Therapy
${modID}:ExposureTherapy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a *Trauma into your deck.

${modID}:Flashback.NAME: Flashback
${modID}:Flashback.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Awaken !M! card.  NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FlashBeforeMyEyes.NAME: Flash Before My Eyes
${modID}:FlashBeforeMyEyes.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Draw !M! cards. If you drew a Forgotten card, gain [E].

${modID}:FlashForward.NAME: Flashforward
${modID}:FlashForward.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Enter Trance. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:FlashForward.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Enter Trance. NL Draw !M! card.

${modID}:FugueState.NAME: Fugue State
${modID}:FugueState.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter Trance, draw !M! card.
${modID}:FugueState.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter Trance, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:GrandRitual.NAME: Grand Ritual
${modID}:GrandRitual.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next X turns, draw 1 card and enter Trance. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:GrandRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next X+1 turns, draw 1 card and enter Trance. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Groundwork.NAME: Groundwork
${modID}:Groundwork.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your next turn, Awaken !M! card.
${modID}:Groundwork.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your next turn, Awaken !M! cards.

${modID}:HappyPlace.NAME: Happy Place
${modID}:HappyPlace.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block for every Forgotten card in your hand.

${modID}:Haze.NAME: Haze
${modID}:Haze.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! Insomnia to the attacker.

${modID}:Hibernation.NAME: Hibernation
${modID}:Hibernation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Forget a card, shuffle it back into your deck. NL When your draw pile is empty, Die.

${modID}:HideUnderTheCovers.NAME: Hide Under The Covers
${modID}:HideUnderTheCovers.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase the cost of this card by 1 this combat.

${modID}:Hypochondria.NAME: Hypochondria
${modID}:Hypochondria.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Remove all your debuffs. Exhaust.
${modID}:Hypochondria.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Remove all your debuffs.

${modID}:InOneEar.NAME: In One Ear
${modID}:InOneEar.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Forget 1 card. NL Draw 2 cards.
${modID}:InOneEar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Urgent. Forget 1 or more cards. NL Draw that many cards, plus 1.

${modID}:IntoNextWeek.NAME: Into Next Week
${modID}:IntoNextWeek.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E].

${modID}:Leitmotif.NAME: Leitmotif
${modID}:Leitmotif.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you Awaken another card, Awaken this card. NL Forget.

${modID}:LightSleeper.NAME: Light Sleeper
${modID}:LightSleeper.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all non-Forgotten cards drawn this way.

${modID}:LongNight.NAME: Long Night
${modID}:LongNight.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Insomnia. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:LongNight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Insomnia.

${modID}:LucidDream.NAME: Lucid Dream
${modID}:LucidDream.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Awaken !M! card and gain !M! Amnesia.

${modID}:Lurch.NAME: Lurch
${modID}:Lurch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Forget the top card of your draw pile.

${modID}:MagicalThinking.NAME: Magical Thinking
${modID}:MagicalThinking.DESCRIPTION: Exchange the cost of this card with another card in your hand until the end of combat.
${modID}:MagicalThinking.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exchange the cost of this card with another card in your hand until the end of combat. NL Forget.

${modID}:MassSuggestion.NAME: Mass Suggestion
${modID}:MassSuggestion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If  Remembered, apply !M! Insomnia to ALL enemies.
${modID}:MassSuggestion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If  Remembered, apply !M! Insomnia to ALL enemies. NL Forget.

${modID}:MemorySkip.NAME: Memory Skip
${modID}:MemorySkip.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Gain !B! Block. NL The next card you play costs 0.

${modID}:MindMeld.NAME: Mind Meld
${modID}:MindMeld.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you Awaken a card, apply !M! Insomnia to this enemy. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Mnemonic.NAME: Mnemonic
${modID}:Mnemonic.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each time you shuffled your draw pile this combat. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:NewLeaf.NAME: New Leaf
${modID}:NewLeaf.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, Awaken 1 card and permanently Transform it. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Oblivious.NAME: Oblivious
${modID}:Oblivious.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Forget a card, gain !M! Block.
${modID}:Oblivious.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you Forget a card, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Opener.NAME: Opener
${modID}:Opener.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL  Deal !D! damage.  NL If this is the first card you played this turn, gain [E] and draw !M! card.

${modID}:PavlovianResponse.NAME: Pavlovian Response
${modID}:PavlovianResponse.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Remember an Attack, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:Perfectionist.NAME: Perfectionist
${modID}:Perfectionist.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Lose all your Block. NL Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Perfectionist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Lose all your Block. NL Gain 1 Dexterity.

${modID}:Precog.NAME: Precog
${modID}:Precog.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target intends to attack, Awaken !M! card.

${modID}:Premonition.NAME: Premonition
${modID}:Premonition.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of you next turn, enter Trance.

${modID}:Procrastinate.NAME: Procrastinate
${modID}:Procrastinate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat. NL Forget.

${modID}:PsionicScream.NAME: Psionic Scream
${modID}:PsionicScream.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:PsychicTsunami.NAME: Psychic Tsunami
${modID}:PsychicTsunami.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of cards you Remembered this combat.

${modID}:Reckoning.NAME: Reckoning
${modID}:Reckoning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Insomnia for every Forgotten card in your hand.

${modID}:RecurringDream.NAME: Recurring Dream
${modID}:RecurringDream.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. The next card you Remember this turn is played twice.
${modID}:RecurringDream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. The next 2 cards you Remember this turn are played twice.

${modID}:Reflex.NAME: Reflex
${modID}:Reflex.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Forget !M! card.

${modID}:REMSleep.NAME: REM Sleep
${modID}:REMSleep.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Forgotten card, gain !M! Vigor.

${modID}:Reinterpret.NAME: Reinterpret
${modID}:Reinterpret.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Move a random discarded Forgotten card to the top of your deck.

${modID}:SelfDiscovery.NAME: Self Discovery
${modID}:SelfDiscovery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Awaken a card, upgrade it for the rest of combat.

${modID}:SelfProtection.NAME: Self Protection
${modID}:SelfProtection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Remembered, gain !M! Dexterity.
${modID}:SelfProtection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Remembered, gain !M! Dexterity. NL Forget.

${modID}:SleepingPill.NAME: Sleeping Pill
${modID}:SleepingPill.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Forget a card.

${modID}:Sleepwalk.NAME: Sleepwalk
${modID}:Sleepwalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Forget a card.

${modID}:Slumber.NAME: Slumber
${modID}:Slumber.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you forgot a card this turn, gain [E] [E].

${modID}:Snooze.NAME: Snooze
${modID}:Snooze.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, retain !M! random forgotten cards.

${modID}:SpinningStrike.NAME: Spinning Strike
${modID}:SpinningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Dizzy into your deck.

${modID}:Spiral.NAME: Spiral
${modID}:Spiral.DESCRIPTION: Double the target's Insomnia. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SpringCleaning.NAME: Spring Cleaning
${modID}:SpringCleaning.DESCRIPTION: Awaken X cards and Exhaust them. NL Gain [E] equal to their combined cost. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SpringCleaning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Awaken X+1 cards and Exhaust them. NL Gain [E] equal to their combined cost. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TheatreOfTheMind.NAME: Theatre Of The Mind
${modID}:TheatreOfTheMind.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Remember a card this turn, enter Trance.

${modID}:Tongues.NAME: Tongues
${modID}:Tongues.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Awaken 1 card.

${modID}:Torpor.NAME: Torpor
${modID}:Torpor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Remember a card, apply !M! Insomnia to the target.

${modID}:Trauma.NAME: Trauma
${modID}:Trauma.DESCRIPTION: Starts Forgotten. NL Urgent. NL Lose 2HP. NL Forget.

${modID}:TossAndTurn.NAME: Toss And Turn
${modID}:TossAndTurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the cost of this card by 1 this combat.

${modID}:WardOff.NAME: Ward Off
${modID}:WardOff.DESCRIPTION: This turn, when an enemy attacks you, first remove Insomnia from the enemy up to the damage dealt, then reduce the damage dealt by the Insomnia removed.
